|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0030 |subvendor_id = 1a56 |subdevice_id = 2000 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-AR5BHB116 |icid = 4104A-AR5BHB116 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 68:A3:C4

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2x2:2 MIMO
*Device is a [[Lite-On WN6503A]]H V02 :(Toshiba part PA3920U-1MPC) :using the [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] reference design.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/4590/bigfoots-killern-1102-wireless-networking-vs-the-world/1 Reviewed on Anandtech] *See [http://forum.notebookreview.com/alienware-m11x/593980-m11x-450mbps-wifi-bigfoot-networks-2.html this NotebookReview post] for shots of the device. *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/4726/qualcomm-atheros-acquires-bigfoot-networking Qualcomm Atheros acquires Bigfoot Networking - AnandTech]
